title: 9/29/17 - The Great Global Redesign (Steven Crowder, Phil Kerpen & Bill O'Reilly join Glenn)
description:
Reality Winner has the smugglers blues ...Steven Crowder (www.LouderWithCrowder.com) calls in to discuss his recent undercover sting with Antifa ...Infiltrate and undercover...it was way too easy ...'Judgment Free' Spaces...Wellness To Go...'Morning-After Pill' in vending machines on college campuses ...'Very uncomfortable things' with Bill O'Reilly...Is Bill going back to Fox News?... Everything as we know it is about to change...The Great Global Redesign ...Columnist Phil Kerpen joins the show to discuss the trial the media won't talk about...corrupt New Jersey Sen. Robert Menedez bribes for action.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
